descriptionCoffeeDelivery: Application of a fictitious coffee shop, which contains the following functionalities:
List of products (coffees) available for purchase
Add a specific quantity of items to the cart
Increase or remove the quantity of items in the cart
Form for user to fill in with validation
Display total items in cart in Header
Display the total value of the sum of items in the cart multiplied by the value
descriptionGitHubBlog: Application that consumes the github API, which contains the following functionalities:
Profile listing, picture, number of followers, name, and other information available via the GitHub API.)
List and filter all issues in the repository with a short summary of its contents
Create a page to display a complete post (issue)
